Docs.summary: Collects all errors generated by the . This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class is created by <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcException> to collect instances of the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError> class. <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection> always contains at least one instance of the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError> class.
## Examples The following example displays each <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError> within the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection>.
